snippet: The authorities deported hundreds of Sudanese, most of them from Darfur, prompting appeals from the United Nations and criticism from human rights groups.
abstract: United Nations and human rights groups report that Jordan has deported hundreds of asylum seeker from Sudan, many of them from Darfur region.

byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce contributed reporting from Geneva.

lead_paragraph: The authorities deported hundreds of Sudanese, most of them from Darfur, prompting appeals from the United Nations and criticism from human rights groups.

headline.main: Jordan Deports Sudanese Asylum Seekers, Spurring Outcry
headline.print_headline: Refugees Are Deported to Sudan by Jordan
